name: Dargon Package
summary: Learn about .DPF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DPF files are used by LOL game community enthusiasts for storing and distributing LOL modifications.

description: Game modification package used by Dargon, an application used for applying custom alterations to the MOBA game League of Legends (LOL); contains data for a game modification and can be applied to LOL using the Dargon software.
